固目: (かため) - (ant: 柔らかめ) hardness; firmness
固着: (こちゃく) - adherence to; sticking fast; fixation
固着観念: (こちゃくかんねん) - (yoji)  fixed idea; idee fixe; obsession; fixation
固結び: (かたむすび) - reef knot; flat knot; square knot
固練り: (かたねり) - stiff consistency; thick paste
固練りコンクリート: (かたねりコンクリート) - stiff-consistency concrete
固肥える: (かたごえる) - to put on a moderate amount of lean or firm weight; to gain healthy weight (e.g. from muscle); to become overweight as opposed to obese
固苦しい: (かたぐるしい) - formal; strict; ceremonious; stiff
固陋: (ころう) - stubbornly sticking to old ways; dislike of new things; narrow-mindedness
固陋頑迷: (ころうがんめい) - (yoji) obstinate; stubborn; hard-headed; being incapable of making sound judgments because of a narrow, inflexible and obstinate mentality
固電: (こでん) - landline phone; fixed phone (in contrast to mobile)
国: (país) - country , country, state; region; national government, central government; home (i.e. hometown, home country)
国つ神: (くにつかみ) - gods of the land; earthly deities
国の栄え: (くにのさかえ) - prosperity of a country
国を売る: (くにをうる) - to betray one's country (to an enemy)
国を治める: (くにをおさめる) - to manage a state; to govern a country
国一揆: (くにいっき) - province-wide uprising (Muromachi period); provincial revolt
国中: (こくちゅう) - all over the country
国事犯: (こくじはん) - political offence; political offense
国事行為: (こくじこうい) - constitutional functions (of the emperor)
国交を結ぶ: (こっこうをむすぶ) - to enter into diplomatic relations
国交断絶: (こっこうだんぜつ) - breakup of diplomatic relations; diplomatic break
国交相: (こっこうしょう) - Minister of Land, Infrastructure and Transportation
国交省: (こっこうしょう) - Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism
国人: (くにゅうど) - indigenous person/inhabitant of a country; (くにびと only) local/native; local lords and samurai; (くにうど, くにゅうど only)  daimyo who did not leave his domains to meet the shogun in Kyoto (during the Muromachi period)
国会: (こっかい) - National Diet; parliament; congress
国会図書館: (こっかいとしょかん) - National Diet Library; Library of Congress
国会対策委員会: (こっかいたいさくいいんかい) - committee of the National Diet
国会答弁: (こっかいとうべん) - answers in the Diet
国会議事堂: (こっかいぎじどう) - national parliament or congress building (e.g. National Diet Building (Japan), United States Capitol (USA), Houses of Parliament (UK), etc.)
国会議事録: (こっかいぎじろく) - Diet Record
国会議員: (こっかいぎいん) - member of National Diet; Diet member; member of parliament; MP
国会運営: (こっかいうんえい) - business in the Diet; managing Diet affairs
国体: (こくたい) - national polity; National Athletic Meet
国債: (kokusai) - dívida nacional, títulos nacionais, títulos do governo, valores mobiliários do governo
国債先物: (こくさいさきもの) - government bond futures
国債発行: (こくさいはっこう) - government bond issuance
国債費: (こくさいひ) - debt-servicing costs; expenditure for servicing government bonds
国光: (こっこう) - national glory; Ralls Genet (cultivar of apple)/Ralls Janet/Rawls Jennet
国入り: (くにいり) - visiting one's constituency; feudal lord's return to his estate
国公立: (こっこうりつ) - national and public
国公立大学: (こっこうりつだいがく) - national, prefectural and other public universities and colleges
国共内戦: (こっきょうないせん) - Chinese Civil War (1927-1937, 1946-1949)
国典: (こくてん) - national law/laws of a nation; national rites and ceremonies; Japanese literature
国内事情: (こくないじじょう) - internal (domestic) affairs
国内向け: (こくないむけ) - for domestic use
国内均衡: (こくないきんこう) - domestic equilibrium; internal balance; internal equilibrium
国内外: (こくないがい) - domestic and foreign; inside and outside the country
国内市場: (こくないしじょう) - domestic market
国内拠点: (こくないきょてん) - domestic locations (e.g. of a company); domestic bases
国内旅行: (こくないりょこう) - domestic travel
国内法: (こくないほう) - municipal (civic) law; domestic law; national law
国内消費税: (こくないしょうひぜい) - excise tax
国内産業: (こくないさんぎょう) - domestic industry
国内的: (こくないてき) - internal (to a country); interior; home; national; domestic
国内純生産: (こくないじゅんせいさん) - net domestic product; NDP
国内経済: (こくないけいざい) - domestic economy
国内総生産: (こくないそうせいさん) - gross domestic product; GDP
国内線: (こくないせん) - domestic air route; domestic airline (company)
国内製: (こくないせい) - domestic; of domestic manufacture
国内規格化: (こくないきかくか) - international standardization; international standardisation
国内需要: (こくないじゅよう) - domestic demand
国分寺: (こくぶんじ) - (Nara Era) state-supported provincial temples
国利民福: (こくりみんぷく) - (yoji) national interests and the people's welfare
国労: (こくろう) - National Railway Workers Union
国務大臣: (こくむだいじん) - Minister of State
国務次官補: (こくむじかんほ) - Assistant Secretary of State
国務長官: (こくむちょうかん) - Secretary of State
国務院: (こくむいん) - State Council (of the People's Republic of China)
国勢: (こくせい) - state (condition, strength) of a country
国史: (こくし) - history of a nation; Japanese history
国号: (こくごう) - name of a country
